# Government Tender Announcement

**Registrar Services for ISO 9001 Registration**

**Contract Title:** Registrar Services in Support of Meteorological Service of Canada Enterprise Quality Management System for the ISO 9001 Standard

**Procurement Number:** 5000068974R

**Closing Date:** April 9, 2024, 14:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Environment and Climate Change Canada

**Brief Description:** Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking a contractor to provide ISO 9001 registration services for its Meteorological Service of Canada (MSC) Enterprise Quality Management System (QMS). The services will include a conformity assessment of the ISO 9001 certified MSC-E QMS, in accordance with ISO/IEC 17021 and IAF MD4. The contractor will determine the necessary work processes and site visits required to complete the conformity assessment.

**Key Requirements:**

* The contractor must have expertise in ISO 9001 registration and conformity assessment.
* The contractor must perform the conformity assessment in accordance with ISO/IEC 17021 and IAF MD4.
* The contractor will determine the necessary work processes and site visits required to complete the conformity assessment.
* The contract period will be from the contract date to March 31, 2027.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical merit: 70%
* Price: 30%

**Contract Options:**

* The contractor grants Canada the irrevocable option to extend the contract term by up to three (3) additional one-year periods.
* The contractor agrees to be paid in accordance with the applicable provisions as set out in the Basis of Payment.

**Contact Information:**

* Mitchell Palmer
* mitchell.palmer@ec.gc.ca
* (613) 854-7053

**Attaching Documents:**

* The full tender notice and solicitation documents are available on the Canada Buys website.

Note: The notice is available in both English and French.

# Selection Criteria and Evaluation Process

The evaluation process will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The selection committee will evaluate proposals based on the following criteria:

* Technical merit (70%): The proposal must demonstrate the contractor's expertise in ISO 9001 registration and conformity assessment, as well as their ability to perform the necessary work processes and site visits.
* Price (30%): The proposal must include the contractor's proposed price for the services.
